name: Populous
overview: You are a Supreme Being. The forces of nature are at your command. The earth rumbles at your fingertips, the oceans swell at your touch. Your faithful worshipers depend on you to provide them with fertile land so they can multiply and grow in strength, helping you conquer the world. Al in the name of goodness. But evil scours the land while you toil. Move quickly and lead your following to face the heart of darkness. The thunderous heartbeat of evil pulses relentlessly, call you forth to your destiny. This is no mortal task. But fear not, you are no mortal!
